data.title: Default HowItWorks Section
data.benefit1Description: Learn from like-minded participants who are experiencing similar challenges on their own health journeys.
data.benefit2Description: Take an optional and simple saliva test to help us understand how your genes play a role in your health.
data.description: The missing link to better health is often from not knowing enough about yourself. Join Newtopia for personalized health coaching based on your personality, lifestyle, motivation and genetic makeup! A few quick steps will unlock your deeply personalized experience, complete with access to a personality-matched coach to support your best self
data.title: How it works
